title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 236: Featuring Joffrey Lupul, Shane O'Brien & Andrew McLaughlin
description:
On Friday's episode of Spittin' Chiclets the guys are joined by Joffrey Lupul, Shane O'Brien and Andrew McLaughlin. The boys join (1:07:51) to tell some stories about their careers and most career businesses as well as talk about their crazy friend group. The guys also touch on the recent firing of Gerard Gallant by the Vegas Golden Knights as well as a ton of other NHL news. The boys wrap up with some random nonsense as well as a Gambling CornerÂ (02:07:19) from Rear Admiral.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
